bug.question: I have six legs and I like to buzz. I make yummy honey. What am I?
I hop around and I am green. I have long legs and I like to eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of grass.

bug.question: I crawl on the ground and carry crumbs. I live in a colony. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I can carry things much bigger than me.
🧺 I work together with my friends.

bug.question: I have colorful wings and fly around flowers. I start as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I used to crawl on leaves.

bug.question: I have spots and bring good luck. I am red with black dots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 Some people think I am lucky.

bug.question: I fly at night and am attracted to light. I am like a butterfly, but different. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 You might see me near a lamp.
🦋 I have wings like a butterfly.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I build my home with silk.
🕷️ I have more legs than you!
🎣 I catch flies in my web.

bug.question: I have wings that shimmer in the sun. I live near water. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I am fast and can fly in all directions.

bug.question: I eat wood and can live in your house. I am small and white. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I like to eat trees and things made from them.
🤍 I am usually pale in color.

bug.question: I jump really far and can be green or brown. I can ruin crops and have strong back legs. What am I?

ocean.question: I am very big and salty, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I cover most of the Earth!

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in the sea and hides in a home of stinging tentacles. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 People like to watch me in movies!
🏠 I live with a spiky plant friend
🟠 I am orange and white striped

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and live in the ocean. I walk sideways. What am I?
I am very big and grey, and I sing songs in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I blow water out of a hole in my back.

ocean.question: I am a very small sea creature that looks like a star. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I live at the bottom of the ocean.

ocean.question: I'm a slippery fish, long and thin, I hide in the rocks, then I grin. What am I?

hints.text: 🪨 I live on the ocean floor!
🐍 I am shaped like a snake.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea, and can squirt ink when scared. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can change color and spray black liquid

ocean.question: I am a strong current in the ocean, like a river flowing through the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am like a highway in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a place in the ocean where it is very deep and dark and many creatures live that we don't know about. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am very, very far down in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a home made of tiny animals, often colorful, and important for many sea creatures. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 Many fish and other sea creatures live in me.
🐠 I can be damaged by pollution.
